article: 44 Creative Activities & Date Ideas for You and Your Girlfriend
intro: Searching for fun unique activities to do with your girlfriend? Look no further. Whether you’re living together, long-distance, or just looking for a new date idea to sweep her off her feet, we’ve got all the best ways to have fun with your significant other. Keep reading for a jam-packed list full of the most exciting and romantic activities for you and that special someone.

points.name: Visit an open house or estate sale.
Go to an aquarium or zoo.

steps.title: Go see your favorite above or under-sea animals.
steps.subtitle: Aquariums can be a relaxing place to watch the fish swim by and see some strange undersea creatures. If fish aren’t your thing, you can also go to a zoo and observe animals in their natural habitats.
sub-points: Make your date laugh by playfully making fun of the extra-weird fish, birds, and other animals.

steps.title: Explore an indoor climbing gym or try an outdoor course.
steps.subtitle: Looking for something active and fun? Book a class at an indoor climbing gym. If you’re interested in taking your skills outdoors, find a certified guide or instructor who can teach you how to climb the nearby crags.
sub-points: If you know someone who climbs outdoors frequently, you can also ask them to take you on their next rockclimbing trip.

points.name: Make cocktails for each other to try.

steps.title: Find cocktail recipes and surprise each other with the result.
steps.subtitle: you find online or create your own cocktail with ingredients you already have at home. After both of you make your mixed drinks, debate about who made the best one!
sub-points: You can also make cocktails that fit a certain theme, like “drinks around the world” or “Wild West booze.” You can also pick a movie and make drinks that match it’s aesthetic.
Make this date alcohol-free by making virgin versions of the drinks you pick.

steps.title: Find cocktail recipes and surprise each other with the result.
steps.subtitle: you find online or create your own cocktail with ingredients you already have at home. After both of you make your mixed drinks, debate about who made the best one!
sub-points: You can also make cocktails that fit a certain theme, like “drinks around the world” or “Wild West booze.” You can also pick a movie and make drinks that match it’s aesthetic.
Make this date alcohol-free by making virgin versions of the drinks you pick.

points.name: Take a ropes course or zipline.

steps.title: Touch the sky at a high-flying adventure park.
steps.subtitle: If you and your girlfriend aren’t afraid of heights, book a zipline tour and sail under the clouds together. Alternatively, strengthen your bond and navigate through challenging obstacles together on a sky-high ropes course.
sub-points: Some courses even have couples’ retreats that can give you the opportunity to strengthen your connection and communication skills while having fun together.

points.name: Plant a garden and soak up the sun.

steps.title: Relax outside and create a garden full of fresh fruits and veggies.
steps.subtitle: all your favorite seasonal vegetables, fruits, flowers, and more in a hand-dug garden built just for the two of you. After you finish planting, grab a glass of lemonade and sit on the patio as you watch your garden (and your relationship) grow.
sub-points: If you don’t have space outside,  instead.

steps.title: Stay connected by playing a word-based game over text.
steps.subtitle: Whether you and your girlfriend are long-distance or just looking for a way to stay connected when you’re not together, try  together!
sub-points: Send a GIF instead of words and have your partner guess what it means.
Play Mad Libs and ask your partner to fill in the blanks over text.
Choose a TV or movie character and send 3 clues to describe them—your girlfriend has to guess who you are.

Choose a TV or movie character and send 3 clues to describe them—your girlfriend has to guess who you are.

steps.title: Set a timer and paint caricatures or portraits of each other.
steps.subtitle: Grab two , , and , then set a timer for 20 to 45 minutes. You can also make this a challenge by seeing who can create the best portrait within the time limit!
sub-points: Alternatively, set a timer for 5 minutes and paint whatever you’d like. When the time is up, switch canvases and repeat the process until both paintings are done!

points.name: Volunteer for a cause you care about.

steps.title: Connect with your community by volunteering.
steps.subtitle: Choose a cause you both care about, like animal rights or conservation, and sign up to volunteer for a couple hours at a local organization. If you both enjoy it, you can even sign up to go every week and benefit the people in your community at the same time.
sub-points: People who volunteer tend to be healthier live longer, partly because volunteering allows you to create a sense of purpose.

points.name: Get an astrology or palm reading.

steps.title: Sing your heart out at a local karaoke bar.
steps.subtitle: A karaoke bar is a great place to unwind and belt out the lyrics to all your favorite songs with your girlfriend. If the date goes really well, you can even use this time to .
sub-points: Some karaoke bars allow you to sing on stage, while others have private rooms.

points.name: Find a chocolate or candy factory tour.
Go to an observatory or planetarium.

steps.title: Search for hidden treasures around town.
steps.subtitle: Geocaching is a large-scale treasure hunt where you find activities hidden around your area. Once you find a cache, there’s usually a little puzzle you and your girlfriend can solve to crack it open. Then you can sign your name in the logbook and enshrine your names in Geocaching history!
sub-points: Download  to start your journey!

steps.title: Order from your girlfriend’s favorite restaurant and take it to-go.
steps.subtitle: Call or order your food online, then pick it up and surprise her with a romantic dinner at home. Light candles, play some mood lighting, and wait for her smile once she sees a beautiful dinner made just for her!
sub-points: If the two of you are long-distance, use a food delivery app to send your sweetheart something delicious.

steps.title: Pet all the cute cats and dogs at your local animal shelter.
steps.subtitle: Whether you’re taking your girlfriend to look for a pet to love forever or just visiting to see all the adorable animals, visiting an animal shelter can be a great activity to do together.
sub-points: Some shelters need volunteers to come in and pet or play with the animals. That way, you can volunteer and enjoy all the cute kittens and puppies at at same time!

steps.title: Reduce your stress and build intimacy by massaging each other.
steps.subtitle: Massaging each other at home can be a great way to show selfless love and affection, foster trust, and express vulnerability. Just put on some relaxing music, grab her favorite lotion or oil, and gently rub her aching muscles.
sub-points: Make it a full-out spa day by giving each other mani-pedis or wearing invigorating .

points.name: Pick outfits for each other at a thrift store.

steps.title: Go through the racks and create funky outfits to wear out.
steps.subtitle: Visit your local thrift store and search the racks for the funkiest, most unusual outfits for each other. When you get your new ‘fits, go out to a nice restaurant and laugh at all the looks you get!
sub-points: You can also pick a movie or TV show character you want your partner to look like and choose an outfit to match!

steps.title: Build something out of clay you and your girlfriend would both love.
steps.subtitle: Creativity can not only play an important role in life satisfaction and emotional well-being, but it can help you form strong emotional bonds with your partner. So why not play with clay together to create something you’d both love?
sub-points: Some ceramics stores also give you pre-made creations to glaze yourself.

steps.title: Grab your favorite snacks and play a new board game.
steps.subtitle: Buy a new board game that you think you and your girlfriend would like, then throw a mini date night! Put on music, dim the lights, make a delicious meal, and play the game together.
sub-points: If you’re looking for a group activity, you can also invite you and your girlfriend’s friends to play with you!

steps.title: Walk around a beautiful garden filled with unique plants.
steps.subtitle: A botanical garden can be a great way to enjoy the beauty of nature while holding the hand of the one you love. Find a garden near you and take the day to just wander around and admire the flowers.
sub-points: Alternatively, visit a garden center and pick out a couple of plants to take home with you!

steps.title: Explore new areas from the comfort of your car.
steps.subtitle: Taking a drive can be a fun way to get out and about without needing a specific destination. Just fill your car with gas, grab some icey drinks, and drive until you stumble across something fun to do together.
sub-points: Stop when you find a cute town, a few shops you’d like to walk around in, or a new restaurant you’d like to try.

points.name: Go ice skating or roller skating.
Visit a comedy club or slam poetry event.

steps.title: Find a multiplayer game online you can explore together.
steps.subtitle: Even if you and your girlfriend aren’t “gamers,” playing video games online can be a great way to unwind and bond together. Go to a game marketplace like  or hook up your gaming system and start your adventure!
sub-points: Alternatively, try this  to play classic board games together online.

steps.title: Put on your jeans and boots for a Western-style show.
steps.subtitle: Grab your girlfriend and mosey on over to your local rodeo for a hootin’ and hollerin’ good time. Not only are they full of interesting shows, but most have local shops to wander into and cute horses and other animals to see!
sub-points: Find a rodeo near you with  or .

steps.title: Choose dinner and dessert recipes to make for each other.
steps.subtitle: Assign each of you one meal to make (like dinner and dessert or an appetizer and dinner) and surprise each other with the one you make. You can also make two different recipes for dinner and judge who made the best one!
sub-points: Alternatively, gather 5 to 10 ingredients and try to cook your own unique dishes in a -style competition. Then judge who made the best meal!

steps.title: Sleep under the stars at your local campground.
steps.subtitle: Travel with your girlfriend up to the mountains or to one of your local state parks and set up a tent for just the two of you. Once you’re there, you can go hiking, build a campfire, or go kayaking or canoeing!
sub-points: Alternatively, set up a tent in your backyard and pretend to be out in nature.

steps.title: Create a music playlist with all your favorite songs.
steps.subtitle: Music can be a great way to bond with your partner. Not only can you listen to all their favorite tunes and learn why they love them, but you can craft something incredible together and include all the songs that remind you of them.
sub-points: Play this playlist while you’re on other dates, when you’re driving around together, or when you just need a little pick-me-up.

points.name: Go to an art or history museum.

steps.title: Taste-test your favorite wines or beers together.
steps.subtitle: If you’re looking for a unique way to bond with your partner, matchmaker and dating coach Courney Quinlan recommends going “on a tour of a brewery or to a winery.” Taste your favorite alcoholic beverages and take a walk around the factory to see how they make them.
sub-points: Vineyards also allow you to enjoy the great outdoors as you take a romantic walk around the property.

steps.title: Go on a weekend getaway and explore a new town.
steps.subtitle: Going on vacation allows you to create new memories while figuring out how to handle challenges in a new unfamiliar place together. Pick a place where the two of you would like to visit, book your tickets, and prepare for a fun relaxing holiday!
sub-points: If you’re looking for birthday ideas, licensed relationship therapist Alysha Jeney says this might be a great time to surprise your girlfriend “with a vacation or an Airbnb.”
